name: SetPlayerScore
description: Set a player's score. Players' scores are shown in the scoreboard (shown by holding the TAB key).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the score of.

params_body.name: score
params_body.description: The value to set the player's score to.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player specified does not exist.
related_fn: GetPlayerScore: Get the score of a player.
